title: Traumatic (In a good way...)
review: Requiem for a dream lacks nothing when you think about it. Perfect plot, perfect cinematography, perfect ending and perfect acting. Only critic I can give is that some scenes are kind of repeated to make the message more intense, even though it is not needed. Watching this will deffinitely affect you and leave a mark in your life, meaning you most probably will never forget it.

title: Recommended!
review: Trainspotting is one of the movies that you could watch over and over again and never get bored. Definitely a movie that could be your favourite after the first time watching it.
